import React from "react"; import "./Post.css"; import { UilEllipsisV } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; import { Users } from "./../../dummyData.js"; import { UilThumbsUp, UilHeart } from "@iconscout/react-unicons"; function Post(props) { return (
user.id === props.post.id)[0] .profilePicture } className="postProfileImg" alt="profile pic" /> {Users.filter((user) => user.id === props.post.id)[0].username} {props.post.date}
{props.post?.desc}
{props.post.like} people liked it
{" "} {props.post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
